TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultipleViewPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: Represents controls that provide, and are able to switch between, multiple representations of the same set of information or child controls.

span.span: Represents controls that provide, and are able to switch between, multiple representations of the same set of information or child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 여러 뷰를 제공할 수 있는 컨트롤의 예로 목록 뷰 (축소판, 타일, 아이콘 또는 세부 정보로 해당 내용을 표시), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] 차트 (원형, 선, 가로 막대형, 수식이 있는 셀 값) [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] 문서 (보통, 웹 레이아웃 인쇄 레이아웃, 읽기 레이아웃, 개요) [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] 달력 (연도, 월, 주, 일) 및 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wmp-md.md)] 스킨입니다.Examples of controls that can present multiple views include the list view (which can show its contents as thumbnails, tiles, icons, or details), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] charts (pie, line, bar, cell value with a formula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documents (normal, Web layout, print layout, reading layout, outline), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendar (year, month, week, day) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wmp-md.md)] skins. 지원되는 뷰는 컨트롤 개발자가 결정하며 컨트롤마다 다릅니다.The supported views are determined by the control developer and are specific to each control.

summary.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 캐시 된 포함 된 구조체 [! 컨트롤 패턴에 대해 INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 속성 값입니다.

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 캐시 된 속성 값 해야 이전에 요청한 사용 하는 합니다.Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 사용 하 여 속성의 현재 값을 가져오려고 합니다.Use to get the current value of a property. 사용 가능한 속성 및 해당 용도에 대 한 정보를 참조 하세요. 합니다.For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

summary.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 현재 포함 된 구조체 [! 컨트롤 패턴에 대해 INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 속성 값입니다.

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 패턴에서 이어야 합니다는 사용 하 여는 현재 값을 얻으려면 참조 합니다.This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 경우는 를 사용 하 여 가져온 캐시 된 데이터를 포함 하 고 모든 속성의 현재 값을 가져오려고 하면 예외가 발생 합니다.If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 사용 하 여 를 사용 하 여 이전에 지정 된 속성의 캐시 된 값을 검색할는 합니다.Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 사용 가능한 속성 및 해당 용도에 대 한 정보를 참조 하세요. 합니다.For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CurrentViewProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.This identifier is used by UI automation client applications. UI 자동화 공급자의 해당 필드를 사용 해야 합니다.UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 정수 가져옵니다 지 원하는 컨트롤에 대 한 현재 뷰를 나타내는 합니다.In the following example, an integer is obtained that represents the current view for a control that supports . [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#100)] [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetViewName(int32 viewId) cil managed
Public Function GetViewName (viewId As Integer) As String

summary.span: Retrieves the name of a control-specific view.

span.span: Retrieves the name of a control-specific view.

returns.span: A localized string representing the control-specific view name.

span.span: A localized string representing the control-specific view name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 뷰 식별자를 사용 하 여 검색할 수 입니다.View identifiers can be retrieved by using . 컨트롤별 보기 식별자 컬렉션 인스턴스에서 동일 합니다.The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances. 뷰 이름은 텍스트 읽어주기, 브라유 점자 및 기타 액세스할 수 있는 응용 프로그램에 적합 합니다.View names are suitable for use in Text to Speech, Braille, and other accessible applications. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 현재 보기의 컨트롤별 이름을 지 원하는 컨트롤에서 검색 됩니다 합니다.In the following example, the control-specific name of the current view is retrieved from a control that supports . [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

exception.span: is not a member of the supported views collection.

span.span: is not a member of the supported views collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 자동화 공급자의 해당 필드를 사용 해야 합니다.UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 패턴 식별자를 같은 메서드에 전달 지정 된 위치에서 원하는 컨트롤 패턴을 검색할 합니다.The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 컨트롤 패턴에서 가져온는 합니다.In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCurrentView(int32 viewId) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 뷰 식별자를 사용 하 여 검색할 수 입니다.View identifiers can be retrieved by using . 컨트롤별 보기 식별자 컬렉션 인스턴스에서 동일 합니다.The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 컬렉션 컨트롤에 대 한 사용 가능한 보기를 지 원하는 컨트롤 패턴 검색 됩니다.In the following example, the collection of views available for a control that supports the control pattern is retrieved. 뷰 식별자 컬렉션의 멤버는 컨트롤의 현재 뷰를 수정 하려면 이후에 사용 됩니다.A member of the view identifiers collection is subsequently used to modify the current view of the control. [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

exception.span: is not a member of the supported views collection.

span.span: is not a member of the supported views collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SupportedViewsProperty As AutomationProperty

summary.span: Identifies the property that gets the control-specific collection of views.

span.span: Identifies the property that gets the control-specific collection of views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.This identifier is used by UI automation client applications. UI 자동화 공급자의 해당 필드를 사용 해야 합니다.UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 이 속성에 없는 를 사용 하 여 가져와야 하 또는 합니다.This property is not present in and must be retrieved by using or . ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 정수 식별자 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 지 원하는 컨트롤에 대 한 사용 가능한 현재 뷰를 나타내는 합니다.In the following example, a collection of integer identifiers is obtained that represents the current views available for a control that supports . [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#100)] [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#102)]
